gameDetails.name: Railways of the World: Mines
gameDetails.description: This expansion includes four mine markers in each of the six player colors.  These are to be used to mark which cities have mines owned by which players, as introduced in Railways of North America. This was one of four expansions released separately for Railways of the World (formerly Railroad Tycoon) that were subsequently bundled into the Railways of the World: Mini-Expansions item.
